IpHeader
========

**Overview**\ 
--------------

**Related Modules:**

`WLAN <wlan.md>`__

**Description:**

Defines the IP header information of a data frame, including the version
number, service type, and total length.

**Since:**

1.0

**Summary**\ 
-------------

Data Fields
-----------
